text: Magar on gurūh az muşrikon, ki ʙo onho pajmon ʙastaed va dar pajmoni xud heç kamʙudie najovardaand (ja'ne, xijonat nakardand) va ʙo heç kas ʙar ziddi şumo naʙaromadaand. Bo inho ʙa pajmoni xeş to pojoni muddataş vafo kuned, hamono Alloh parhezgoronro (ononro, ki xijonat namekunand), dūst medorad
